statements: SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_experiments ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT experiment_id, soil_type, crop_yield FROM crop_rotation_experiments WHERE soil_type = 'Loam'
SELECT rotation_sequence, start_date, end_date FROM crop_rotation_experiments WHERE crop_yield > 10000 ORDER BY crop_yield DESC
SELECT experiment_id, rotation_sequence, soil_type, start_date, end_date FROM crop_rotation_experiments WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_experiments ORDER BY rotation_sequence ASC, start_date ASC
SELECT experiment_id, soil_type, crop_yield FROM crop_rotation_experiments WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY crop_yield DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_experiments WHERE soil_type = 'clay' AND crop_yield > 50 ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT experiment_id, soil_type, end_date FROM crop_rotation_experiments WHERE crop_yield < 30 AND rotation_sequence = 'ABCDE' ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT experiment_id, rotation_sequence, start_date, end_date FROM crop_rotation_experiments WHERE crop_yield BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT experiment_id, rotation_sequence, soil_type FROM crop_rotation_experiments WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2020-06-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY soil_type ASC
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_experiments;
SELECT rotation_sequence, soil_health_score FROM crop_rotation_experiments;
SELECT experiment_id, soil_health_score, rotation_sequence FROM crop_rotation_experiments;
SELECT * FROM rotation_sequence_details;
SELECT crop_name, harvest_date FROM rotation_sequence_details;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_experiments WHERE soil_health_score > 80 ORDER BY experiment_id DESC;

SELECT experiment_id, rotation_sequence FROM crop_rotation_experiments INNER JOIN rotation_sequence_details ON crop_rotation_experiments.experiment_id = rotation_sequence_details.sequence_id WHERE crop_name = 'Corn';
SELECT experiment_id, rotation_sequence, soil_health_score FROM crop_rotation_experiments WHERE rotation_sequence LIKE '%Rotation%' ORDER BY soil_health_score ASC;
SELECT AVG(soil_health_score) AS avg_soil_health_score FROM crop_rotation_experiments;
SELECT experiment_id, rotation_sequence, soil_health_score FROM crop_rotation_experiments WHERE soil_health_score BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY rotation_sequence, experiment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiment_data;
SELECT crop_name, rotation_sequence FROM experiment_data WHERE soil_health_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation WHERE crop_family = 'Legume';
SELECT rotation_id, crop_name, crop_rotation_sequence FROM crop_rotation ORDER BY rotation_id DESC;
SELECT rating_description FROM soil_health_ratings;
SELECT * FROM experiment_data WHERE soil_health_rating > 3;
SELECT experiment_id, crop_name FROM experiment_data WHERE crop_name = 'Corn' ORDER BY experiment_id DESC;
SELECT crop_name, count(*) as crop_count FROM experiment_data GROUP BY crop_name HAVING crop_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation WHERE crop_family = 'Legumes' ORDER BY rotation_id;
SELECT s.rating_description, e.crop_name FROM soil_health_ratings s JOIN experiment_data e ON s.rating_id = e.soil_health_rating;
SELECT * FROM CropRotationExperiment;
SELECT crop_id, crop_name FROM Crop ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, rotation_sequence, soil_health_score FROM CropRotationExperiment WHERE soil_health_score > 80;
SELECT crop_id, crop_name, crop_family FROM Crop WHERE crop_family = 'Legumes';
SELECT result_id, experiment_id, crop_id, yield FROM ExperimentResults WHERE yield > 1000 ORDER BY yield DESC;
SELECT * FROM CropRotationExperiment;
SELECT experiment_id, rotation_sequence FROM CropRotationExperiment WHERE soil_health_score > 5;
SELECT crop_name, yield FROM Crop JOIN ExperimentResults ON Crop.crop_id = ExperimentResults.crop_id;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples WHERE soil_ph < 6 ORDER BY sample_timestamp DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, AVG(yield) AS avg_yield FROM ExperimentResults GROUP BY experiment_id HAVING avg_yield > 50;
SELECT * FROM Experiment;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name FROM Experiment WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT plot_id, plot_number, plot_location FROM Plot WHERE plot_number > 10;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM Crop WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit';
SELECT observation_id, growth_rate, yield FROM Observation ORDER BY yield DESC;
SELECT * FROM Experiment;
SELECT experiment_name, start_date, end_date FROM Experiment WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT plot_number, plot_size, plot_location FROM Plot WHERE plot_size > 10.00;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, planting_date FROM Crop ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT observation_id, growth_rate, yield FROM Observation WHERE growth_rate BETWEEN 3.0 AND 5.0;
